name: PurperMC
description: The PurperMC server software for Minecraft: Java Edition.

installScript.script: LATEST_VERSION=$(curl -s https://api.purpurmc.org/v2/purpur | jq -r '.versions[-1]') && LATEST_BUILD=$(curl -s https://api.purpurmc.org/v2/purpur/$LATEST_VERSION | jq -r '.builds.latest') && JAR_NAME=purpur-$LATEST_VERSION-$LATEST_BUILD.jar && wget -O server.jar https://api.purpurmc.org/v2/purpur/$LATEST_VERSION/$LATEST_BUILD/download && echo
